title: WHy riot?
body: So when you add a tribunal system that doesn't allow you to cuss at trolls it makes me and other players extremely toxic. Also its toxic when you make it so people can give false reports or when you ban someone for flaming at a troll. You ban people that have over 150 Honorable opponents because they had a bad day and cussed at a stupid little noob troll that kept on harassing them. You make it seem as if you don't give a shit about your community and you expect us to be passive little sheep that act nice and say nice things about your servers. I know your going to delete this because you can't stand someone getting angry at you because you act like children, grow up please.
